name: When I Grow Up I Want to be
name_original: When I Grow Up I Want to be
description:
• When I was (3) I wanted to be a (dad).
  • When I was (4) I wanted to be a (toy designer).
  • When I was (5) I wanted to be a (video game maker).
  • When I was (5.5) I wanted to be a (ninja chef).

Now that I am (30), I know I want to be a (kid) when I grow up!

Kid run & jump on 3d platforms, shoot colorful bullets when wearing shoes, fight horrible monsters.

Fully support game pad.

Keyboard: ASDW to move, Space to jump
